example.code: Remove-APSUsageReportSubscription Confirm Are you sure you want to perform this action? Performing the operation "Remove-APSUsageReportSubscription (DeleteUsageReportSubscription)" on target "". [Y] Yes [A] Yes to All [N] No [L] No to All [S] Suspend [?] Help (default is "Y"): A
example.description: This sample disables AppStream Usage Report subscription
